TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Busi, title = Busi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Busi} }

S.FORM: busi Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko busi a niyaro', 69 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 249 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 232 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 17 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq85%, Tayal4%, Bunun2%, Amis1%, Truku2%.

bosi Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko bosi a niyaro', 69 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 249 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 232 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 17 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq85%, Tayal4%, Bonon2%, Amis1%, Troko2%.
